name: Library
description: Quiet study area with books and computers. Located on the 2nd floor, B-wing.

name: Student Cafeteria
description: Main cafeteria serving lunch and snacks. Located on the 1st floor, near the main entrance.

name: IT Helpdesk
description: Technical support for students. Located in room A105.

name: Gym
description: Campus gym for students and staff. Located in the basement, C-wing.
